languages.text: "Его атаковали. Внезапно и жестоко. Голодный хищник вцепился в его магнитное поле и высосал столько сил, сколько мог... Он был истощен, и, будь у него больше времени, сожрал бы звезду целиком — но не успел".

"It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and drank as much of its energy as it could. The predator was starving and would have surely devoured the star whole had it had more time."
languages.original_text: "Его атаковали. Внезапно и жестоко. Голодный хищник вцепился в его магнитное поле и высосал столько сил, сколько мог... Он был истощен, и, будь у него больше времени, сожрал бы звезду целиком — но не успел".

traits.locale_text: "It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and sucked as much energy as it could... It was exhausted and would certainly devour the whole star, but it had little time."

"It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and sucked as much energy as it could... It was exhausted and would certainly devour the whole star, but it had little time."

"It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and sucked out as much energy as it could... It had come exhausted and would have certainly devoured the entire star, had it had more time."

"It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and sucked out as much energy as it could... It had come exhausted and would have certainly devoured the entire star, had it had more time."

"It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and drank as much of its energy as it could. The predator was starving and would have surely devoured the star whole had it had more time."

languages.text: “它遭到了突然而猛烈的袭击。一只饥饿的捕食者攫住它的磁场，几乎把它的能量吸得一干二净。那只捕食者当时饥肠辘辘，如果给它更多时间的话，它肯定会将整颗恒星吞噬殆尽。”
languages.original_text: "It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and drank as much of its energy as it could. The predator was starving and would have surely devoured the star whole had it had more time."

traits.locale_text: “它遭到了突然而猛烈的袭击。一只饥饿的捕食者攫住它的磁场，几乎把它的能量吸得一干二净。那只捕食者当时饥肠辘辘，如果给它更多时间的话，它肯定会将整颗恒星吞噬殆尽。”

languages.text: « Elle a été attaquée, brusquement et avec férocité. Un prédateur a mordu dans son champ magnétique et s'est repu de toute l'énergie qu'il pouvait... Il était affamé et aurait certainement dévoré l'étoile entière s'il avait eu plus de temps. »
languages.original_text: "It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and drank as much of its energy as it could. The predator was starving and would have surely devoured the star whole had it had more time."

traits.locale_text: « Elle a été attaquée, brusquement et avec férocité. Un prédateur a mordu dans son champ magnétique et s'est repu de toute l'énergie qu'il pouvait... Il était affamé et aurait certainement dévoré l'étoile entière s'il avait eu plus de temps. »

languages.text: "Er wurde angegriffen. Plötzlich und heftig. Ein hungriges Raubtier biss in sein Magnetfeld und trank so viel Energie, wie es konnte. Das Raubtier war hungrig und hätte gewiss den ganzen Stern verschlungen, wenn er mehr Zeit gehabt hätte."
languages.original_text: "It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and drank as much of its energy as it could. The predator was starving and would have surely devoured the star whole had it had more time."

traits.locale_text: "Er wurde angegriffen. Plötzlich und heftig. Ein hungriges Raubtier biss in sein Magnetfeld und trank so viel Energie, wie es konnte. Das Raubtier war hungrig und hätte gewiss den ganzen Stern verschlungen, wenn er mehr Zeit gehabt hätte."

"Er wurde angegriffen. Plötzlich und heftig. Ein hungriges Raubtier biss sich in seinem Magnetfeld fest und saugte so viel Energie heraus, wie es konnte ... Irgendwann war es erschöpft, hätte aber sicher den ganzen Stern verschlungen, wenn es mehr Zeit gehabt hätte."

languages.text: «Atacaron esta estrella con rabia. Un depredador hambriento mordió su campo magnético, absorbiendo toda la energía que pudo... El depredador debía de estar muriendo de hambre y, si hubiera tenido más tiempo, la habría devorado por completo».
languages.original_text: "It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and drank as much of its energy as it could. The predator was starving and would have surely devoured the star whole had it had more time."

traits.locale_text: «Atacaron esta estrella con rabia. Un depredador hambriento mordió su campo magnético, absorbiendo toda la energía que pudo... El depredador debía de estar muriendo de hambre y, si hubiera tenido más tiempo, la habría devorado por completo».

languages.text: 「襲われたんだ。突然、激しく。飢えた捕食者が磁場に噛みつき、可能な限りのエネルギーを飲み干した。そいつは飢えに苦しんでいて、もっと時間さえあれば、その星を丸ごと食らっていただろう」
languages.original_text: "It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and drank as much of its energy as it could. The predator was starving and would have surely devoured the star whole had it had more time."

traits.locale_text: 「襲われたんだ。突然、激しく。飢えた捕食者が磁場に噛みつき、可能な限りのエネルギーを飲み干した。そいつは飢えに苦しんでいて、もっと時間さえあれば、その星を丸ごと食らっていただろう」

languages.text: "Saldırıya uğramış. Ani ve şiddetli bir saldırıya. Aç bir yırtıcı, manyetik alanını ısırıp emebildiğince enerji emmiş. Yırtıcı açlıktan ölüyormuş, vakti olsaymış koca yıldızı mideye indirirmiş."
languages.original_text: "It was attacked. Suddenly and fiercely. A hungry predator bit into its magnetic field and drank as much of its energy as it could. The predator was starving and would have surely devoured the star whole had it had more time."
